name: Master Dojo
description:
For some time now, artificial intelligence has been dominated by the typical personas we have all come to know and love. First there was Eliza... Then came the Jennifers and the list goes on ... All of them have given us hours of entertainment. Well, now there's a new guy. We call him Master Dojo. He's either going to make you laugh or really get on your nerves. One thing is for sure. He's a lot smarter than you might think...

- Dynamic Content Generation
- Over 350 internal responses
- Facebook Integration
- Much much more...

See what you can get him to say. Then, send Master Dojo's responses to your friends on facebook.
